projectGridLines.title: Title: Consultant for scaling Amazon Future Engineer project in Maharashtra
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Consultant for scaling Amazon Future Engineer project in Maharashtra

Description: Amazon future engineer is a childhood to career program run in 6 countries

by Amazon Inc. LFE is one of the partners of AFE project in India. The consultants

working on this project will closely support LFE's implementation and partnerships

team to scaleup the teacher training program of AFE for government schools across

15 districts of Maharashtra reaching out to 5000 teachers impacting 30000 students.

Skill sets: Project Management, Operational Planning, Data handling and visualization,

Facilitating engaging conversations with varied stakeholders, creating learning

content, coding kits for teachers

Traits expectation: Patience, Open to Learning, Ability to adapt to uncertain situations

Expected learning:

1) Understanding of how government school ecosystem operates

2) Project Management skills to handle scaleup of the project spanning across 15

districts of a state

3) Stakeholder management
